deckInfo.name: Chinese -  Electronic Girl::01 Intro
deckInfo.description: Covers Level 1 (characters & small words), Level 2 (phrases), and Level 3 (full lines) for the Intro/Verse 1 of Electronic Girl.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 忽近忽远 (hū jìn hū yuǎn)
conceptGroups.description: Characters 近 (jìn), 远 (yuǎn) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: hu_jin_hu_yuan
vocabulary.explanation: 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 近 (jìn) - near + 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 远 (yuǎn) - far = suddenly near, suddenly far.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 忽隐忽现 (hū yǐn hū xiàn)
conceptGroups.description: Characters 隐 (yǐn), 现 (xiàn) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: hu_yin_hu_xian
vocabulary.explanation: 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 隐 (yǐn) - hidden + 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 现 (xiàn) - appear = suddenly hidden, suddenly appearing.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 忽明忽暗 (hū míng hū àn)
conceptGroups.description: Characters 明 (míng), 暗 (àn) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: hu_ming_hu_an
vocabulary.explanation: 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 明 (míng) - bright + 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 暗 (àn) - dark = suddenly bright, suddenly dark.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 忽快忽慢 (hū kuài hū màn)
conceptGroups.description: Characters 快 (kuài), 慢 (màn) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: hu_kuai_hu_man
vocabulary.explanation: 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 快 (kuài) - fast + 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 慢 (màn) - slow = suddenly fast, suddenly slow.

conceptGroups.description: Reviewing the 忽X忽Y phrases as complete units.

vocabulary.name: hu_jin_hu_yuan
vocabulary.explanation: 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 近 (jìn) - near + 忽 (hū) - suddenly + 远 (yuǎn) - far. The pattern '忽X忽Y' describes rapid alternation between X and Y.
